descriptions.pro_west: Support for NATO/EU/US policies and support for Ukraine; endorsing sanctions, military aid, Ukrainian sovereignty; blaming Russia for the invasion
descriptions.pro_russia: Support for Russia, the Kremlin or Putin; justifying the invasion; blaming the West or Ukraine; defending Russian actions
descriptions.anti_west: Hostility toward NATO/EU/US as an enemy or corrupt force; blaming the West for the war or moral decline
descriptions.anti_ukraine: Hostility toward Ukraine or Ukrainians; blaming Ukraine for the war; denying Ukrainian legitimacy or sovereignty
descriptions.anti_russia: Hostility toward Russia or Russians; collective blame; extreme demonization beyond criticism of policy
descriptions.peace_call: Explicit calls for Russia and Ukraine to stop fighting, negotiate, or end the war
descriptions.neutral: Neutral, informational, unrelated, unclear stance, or purely conversational
